summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Tenth Avenue, from Yesler Way to East Spring Street; Eleventh Avenue, from Yesler Way to East Marion Street; East Fir Street, from Broadway to Twelfth Avenue; East Alder Street, from Tenth Avenue to Twelfth Avenue; and East James Street, from Broadway to Eleventh Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2263 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
